SELECT t.id, t.staff_name, t.staff_code, t.begin_time, t.end_time, t.train_period, t.train_learn_period, t.train_learn_score, t.score, t.train_type, t.train_company, t.certificate_name, t.certificate_code, t.remarks, CONCAT( t.modifier_name, " 于 ", t.MODIFIED_TIME, " 更新" ) updateDesc, t.group_id, t.GROUP_NAME FROM ( SELECT f.id, s.staff_name, s.staff_code, f.begin_time, f.end_time, f.train_period, f.train_learn_period, f.train_learn_score, f.score, dic.label train_type, f.train_company, f.certificate_name, f.certificate_code, f.remarks, usr.USER_NAME modifier_name, f.MODIFIED_TIME, f.STAFF_ID, g.ID group_id, g.GROUP_NAME FROM mp_stafftrain f LEFT JOIN mp_staff s ON s.ID = f.STAFF_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item dic ON dic.value = f.train_type AND dic.type = 'TRAIN_TYPE' LEFT JOIN mp_user usr ON usr.id = f.MODIFIER_CODE LEFT JOIN mp_userpost up ON s.USER_ID = up.USER_ID and up.MAIN_POST=1 LEFT JOIN mp_post p ON p.ID = up.POST_ID LEFT JOIN mp_group g on p.GROUP_ID=g.ID WHERE f.del_flag = 0
and p.GROUP_ID = #{query.groupId}
ORDER BY f.CREATED_TIME desc ) t
and CONCAT( IFNULL(t.staff_name,''), IFNULL(t.staff_code,''), IFNULL(t.begin_time,''), IFNULL(t.end_time,''), IFNULL(t.train_period,''), IFNULL(t.train_learn_period,''), IFNULL(t.train_learn_score,''), IFNULL(t.score,''), IFNULL(t.train_type,''), IFNULL(t.train_company,'') , IFNULL(t.certificate_name,''), IFNULL(t.certificate_code,''), IFNULL(t.remarks,'') ) LIKE concat('%',#{searchText},'%')
